Room.Name: Sunken Pirate Ship
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing on the starboard gun deck of the Snap Dragon.
Room.LongDescription: Nearby are a line of heavy brass cannons, neatly shoved into place with block and tackle. Stacked in pyramids you see the iron balls and metal shards used to cut through the rigging of the Snap Dragon's prey. Until this ship went down, it was the most feared pirate ship in existance. There is a rumor that much of the booty and treasure is buried somewhere near this bay. But then, only a fool believes rumors.
